看一下文档中 [通用事件](http://weex-project.io/cn/wiki/common-events.html) 的 Page 事件。摘录如下：

> viewappear 和 viewdisappear 事件关注的是整个页面的状态，所以它们必须绑定到页面的根元素上。
> 特殊情况下，这两个事件也能被绑定到非根元素的body组件上，例如wxc-navpage组件

@wangqian2017 you may have installed `weex-toolkit` before you run the above command, and that's bug is cause by `npm5`, you can delete the `weex-toolkit` cache on `/usr/local/lib/node_modules/weex-toolkit` or using `npm@4` to install it.
ps: do not use `sudo` command to install a npm package at all, it will cause many permission issues while you using npm package.

不好意思，最近比较忙；
http://dotwe.org/vue/5d7d1986efef98ebff5edd264059f5f9

搞定，是我代理设置的问题。
默认生成的配置有2个小问题，解决方案分别如下。

1.
java - Could not find aapt2-proto.jar - Stack Overflow: http://t.cn/EZh1xON

2.
https://blog.csdn.net/u014300915/article/details/78355420

更新Android Studio 3.0之后，出现Cannot set the value of read-only property ‘outputFile’报错，也就是用来打包后重命名的gradle出现了问题

旧版本
AS 2.3时用的代码：
```

applicationVariants.all { variant ->
        variant.outputs.each { output ->
            def outputFile = output.outputFile
            if (outputFile != null && outputFile.name.endsWith('.apk')) {
                def fileName = "driver_${variant.productFlavors[0].name}_v${defaultConfig.versionName}.apk"
                output.outputFile = new File(outputFile.parent, fileName)
            }
        }
    }

```
修改之后：```

    flavorDimensions 'api'
    productFlavors {
        ...
    }
    android.applicationVariants.all { variant ->
        variant.outputs.all {
            outputFileName = "driver_${variant.productFlavors[0].name}_v${variant.versionName}.apk"
        }
    }

```
你提供的例子我试了一下可以打开 bilibili 的网站，播放不了视频是因为视频链接是 `bilibili:video/xxxxx`， Weex 容器并不识别这种 schema，看起来不像 `<web>` 组件的问题，是 B 站不认识 Weex 容器。建议使用纯净的例子，不要包含这些网站。

Please refer to the document of this `buffer` package: https://www.npmjs.com/package/buffer

> The buffer module from node.js, for the browser.

Not for Weex. It's designed for browser and requires many browser specific APIs.

@hrk1988 This work is already in the works, probably completed in late November.
👍  @wqyfavor  thanks for your suggestions，I  have updated my pull request.

目前 Weex 里的 CSS 还没有实现“优先级”的功能，最终是转换成 JSON 格式的结构交给客户端处理的，某些行为可能和浏览器不一样。 
后续会考虑实现一部分 CSSOM 的能力，到时候能够支持最基本的选择器，也会有优先级的概念。

Thanks for your contribution, but this issue does not offer enough info, it will be closed for now. Please offer more information according to the issue template, then we can have a further discussion.

Thanks for your contribution, but this issue does not offer enough info and seem has nothing to do with Weex. Maybe you can ask it in the Android community.

> 问题提供的信息比较简单，看起来是不是与 Weex 没多大关系？ 欢迎在安卓社区中提问此问题。
According to the screenshot, I guess this bug happens on the Android platform. Please offer more information about it, such as the live example on http://dotwe.org/vue , steps to reproduce.

+ The vote thread in apache mailing list: https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/b9348ee7bd5e9b08ff1d064ffa8ba63c671dd8e41f7bdceba5f6e52d@%3Cgeneral.incubator.apache.org%3E
+ The tag and release note of `v0.19.0`: https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/releases/tag/0.19.0

The doc for  [touch.PageX](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Touch/pageX) shows, pageX :   A long representing the X coordinate of the touch point relative to the viewport, including any scroll offset.

scroll Offset should be taken into consideration, the same as [touch.PageY](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Touch/pageY)

Well, i think so.  but `weexInstance.rootView` and `scroller view` are not the same view for iOS,  there is no scroll offset in touch.pageY  calculation.

Android  set scrollX & scrollY offset  by `locEventOffset.offset(locLeftTop.x, locLeftTop.y)`. There is no similar code in iOS
@imcloud  Ref https://bintray.com/alibabaweex/maven/weex_sdk/0.19.0.3
Be aware of the GFW, thanks.
iOS is using weexcore now, codes above never exists.
It is their in 0.18.0 version of weex sdk. Have we published ios SDK latest than this.
